items.sentence: So far, nobody\'s laughed at any of Tom\'s jokes.
Why do today what you can put off until tomorrow?
Tom and Mary fell in love shortly after they met.
Tom sipped the wine that Mary had poured for him.
I don\'t know when Tom will get back from Boston.
I don\'t think I need to tell Tom why I did that.
Tom asked me if I was going to help Mary do that.
Tom assumed that the meeting would start on time.
How do you know someone hasn\'t already found it?
Tom and Mary didn\'t have anything to talk about.
It\'s very likely someone will be waiting for us.
Tom used to be the most popular kid in the class.
I still don\'t know what was causing the problem.
How long does it usually take you to fall asleep?
How many hotels do you think there are in Boston?
Why didn\'t you tell me you didn\'t like it here?
Tom didn\'t live up to everybody\'s expectations.
I thought we weren\'t supposed to talk about Tom.
I thought you said you weren\'t going to be here.
You\'re probably expecting Tom to arrive on time.
Why don\'t you take a long walk off a short pier?
How would you like your students to remember you?
I know for a fact that Tom would never want this.
The last I heard, Tom and Mary are still married.
Tom emptied the wastebasket into the incinerator.
Tom gave Mary some tips on how to use chopsticks.
Are you really willing to help me paint my house?
Have you ever thought about learning how to swim?
Have you ever wanted to see if you could do that?
Tom won\'t tell anyone where he was last weekend.
Tom was a little worried about what might happen.
Tom was the one who convinced me to learn French.
I\'ve never seen anything quite like this before.
Do you have any other hotels you would recommend?
Do you have any other questions about the matter?
I\'m glad that it\'s not coming out of my pocket.
Why didn\'t you tell me you\'d already done that?
Tom won\'t be spending Christmas with his family.
We used to compete against each other in college.
Tom wondered if Mary knew John had been arrested.
Tom wondered what Mary thought about such things.
Tom wondered what Mary was making in the kitchen.
There is little hope of his winning the election.
If you don\'t understand, please raise your hand.
You\'re the only Canadian I\'ve ever talked with.
You\'re the one who said you wanted to come here.
There\'s something I don\'t understand about Tom.
That doesn\'t sound like something Tom would say.
I want Tom to play something for me on the piano.
I heard that Tom was mean to his last girlfriend.
